description:
In this talk, Brigid and Deborah will cover building an internal capability to develop digital services in-house, and how they are approaching replacing their legacy estate with modern digital applications for their workforce:

- Creating the case for change, how they secured the investment from their Executive Board.
- Developing an operating model that would enable them to deliver their ambition.
- Approaching legacy replacement, taking a modular approach to deliver over time.

SPEAKERS:

Brigid McBride OBE, Ofsted, Programme Director, Digital Change.

Deborah Carne, Ofsted, Head of Portfolio, Projects and
Improvement.

**
This talk will be recorded and the link to the recording put in the Comments after the event takes place.
**
title: Delivering Ofsted's Digital Strategy
